wikipedia_page.main: John Aubrey Conway Howarth,  (19 February 1896 – 31 March 1984) was an English stage, radio and television actor, best remembered for his role as grumpy but likeable elderly war veteran Albert Tatlock; an original cast member in the TV series  Coronation Street between 1960 and 1984. Prior to his work with Coronation Street, he had a lengthy career in theatre, and in the radio soap opera Mrs. Dale's Diary.
